title: Available Themes
content:
# Available Themes Provides a list of themes and their names. The following themes are available in SAPUI5: ****
Theme Name Technical Name
*Morning Horizon* `sap_horizon`
*Evening Horizon* `sap_horizon_dark`
*High Contrast Black* `sap_horizon_hcb`
*High Contrast White* `sap_horizon_hcw`
*Quartz Light* `sap_fiori_3`
*Quartz Dark* `sap_fiori_3_dark`
*High Contrast Black* `sap_fiori_3_hcb`
*High Contrast White* `sap_fiori_3_hcw`
For more information about the support of themes, see [Supported Combinations of Themes and Libraries](../02_Read-Me-First/supported-combinations-of-themes-and-libraries-38ff8c2.md).
